examples.input_context: Podcast segment discussing AI replacement of jobs.
examples.transcript_snippet: [00:12:05] Speaker A: I think people are scared. [00:12:08] Speaker B: They should be. If you are doing manual data entry in 2024, you aren't just at risk, you are already obsolete. The AI doesn't sleep and it costs $20 a month. That's the reality no one wants to hear.
